document_data.name: Derf's Skin Art
document_data.mainbody: '''Derf's Skin Art''' was a business located in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Location: The establishment was located along [[Rogar Alley]] in western Daggerford near the [[Caravan Gate]].
document_data.Activities: Derf's Skin Art provide tattooing services as well as body piercing and artistic scarring. The business was owned by [[Derf]].
